page.title: 18Manor Farm - West Tisted.
page.content: Manor Farm and stud is an estate farm of 1940 acres and covers most of the land in West Tisted village.It employs 24 workers and they and their families live on the farm.The dairy section has 220 Friesian cows with 140 young stock to join the herd in future years.The pig section has 170 sows producing 3000 fat pigs each year mainly for bacon.The sheep section has a flock of 1200 Mule ewes producing 2000 lambs a year.The arable section has 1170 acres of grain,mostly wheat but with some winter and spring barley with a break crop of oilseed rape.The rest of the cultivated land is intensively managed grassland. Also on the farm there are 140 acres of woodland and farm buildings.
